name: Prototyped
author: author
description: Prototyped software solutions for responsive web-based AngularJS apps.

scripts.add:globals: npm run add:grunt-init & npm run add:grunt-cli & npm run add:http-server & npm run add:nodewebkit
scripts.add:grunt-init: if not exist "%APPDATA%/npm/node_modules/grunt-init" call npm install -g grunt-init
scripts.add:grunt-cli: if not exist "%APPDATA%/npm/node_modules/grunt-cli" call npm install -g grunt-cli
scripts.add:http-server: if not exist "%APPDATA%/npm/node_modules/http-server" call npm install -g http-server
scripts.add:nodewebkit: if not exist "%APPDATA%/npm/node_modules/nodewebkit" call npm install -g nodewebkit
